snippet.title: Switch! Love Over Flowers - Ep.1
snippet.description:
■ Synopsis ■

Ever since your mother fell ill, you’ve spent your days working at a flower shop to pay her bills. Your life is simple, but you find it fulfilling, until one day, a customer comes in who turns your life upside down.

Now you’re caught in the middle of a scandal that could affect some of the biggest multinational companies in the world! Your job? Take your twin sister’s place and pretend to be the fiancée of one of the richest heirs in the world. Can you guard your secret, and your heart, from these handsome men?

■ Characters ■

Yuito Kurenai — The Cool Heir

The sole heir of Kurenai Global and your twin sister's fiancée. On the outside, he seems cold and callous, but when the two of you are alone, his passions are hotter than hot. Be careful with how far you take your new role—you could get burned…

Riku Fuse — Pleasant Idol Member

Riku is a former member of a popular idol group and the son of a famous actress. He always acts cheerful and bright, but the more you get to know him, the more you realize that he’s actually rather sensitive. Can you help him face his insecurities head-on?

Haruhisa Anbiru — Your Reliable Confidant

Your father’s protégé, Haruhisa, is the only one who knows who you really are. As your guide to the world of high society, he’ll always be there to help you when you're in trouble. He loves to laugh and tease you, but beneath his confident demeanor, it seems he may be hiding something...

#games #otomegames #otome #otomegame #otomes #otomestories #romancegame
